refnamediv.refpurpose: Type definitions and defines useful for Geoclue clients

refsynopsisdiv.title: Synopsis

refsect2.title: enum GeoclueStatus
enum GeoclueAccuracyLevel
refsect2.para: Enum values used to define the approximate accuracy of Position or Address information.

refsect2.title: enum GeocluePositionFields
refsect2.para: GeocluePositionFields is a bitfield that defines the validity of Position values.

refsect2.title: enum GeoclueVelocityFields
refsect2.para: GeoclueVelocityFields is a bitfield that defines the validity of Velocity values.

refsect2.title: enum GeoclueError

listitem.simpara: Needed information is not currently available (e.g. web service did not respond)

refsect2.title: GEOCLUE_ADDRESS_KEY_COUNTRYCODE
refsect2.para: A key for address hashtables. The hash value should be a ISO 3166 two letter country code.

The used hash keys match the elements of XEP-0080 (XMPP protocol extension for user location), see
http://www.xmpp.org/extensions/xep-0080.html

refsect2.title: GEOCLUE_ADDRESS_KEY_COUNTRY
refsect2.para: A key for address hashtables. The hash value should be a name of a country.

refsect2.title: GEOCLUE_ADDRESS_KEY_REGION
refsect2.para: A key for address hashtables. The hash value should be a name of an administrative region of a nation, e.g. province or US state.

refsect2.title: GEOCLUE_ADDRESS_KEY_LOCALITY
refsect2.para: A key for address hashtables. The hash value should be a name of a town or city.

refsect2.title: GEOCLUE_ADDRESS_KEY_AREA
refsect2.para: A key for address hashtables. The hash value should be a name of an area, such as neighborhood or campus.

refsect2.title: GEOCLUE_ADDRESS_KEY_POSTALCODE
refsect2.para: A key for address hashtables. The hash value should be a code used for postal delivery.

refsect2.title: GEOCLUE_ADDRESS_KEY_STREET
refsect2.para: A key for address hashtables. The hash value should be a partial or full street address.

refsect2.title: enum GeoclueResourceFlags
refsect2.para: bitfield that represents a set of physical resources.

refsect2.title: enum GeoclueNetworkStatus
